title: Wayne Rooney slammed for radio silence over Coleen's row with Rebekah Vardy
text:

Coleen Rooney's spat with Rebekah Vardy is all anyone can talk about — everyone except her husband Wayne, that is.

And fans have criticised the D.C. United footballer, 33, for his radio silence over the whole saga.

He's continued to tweet but is yet to make a single comment about the fall out, which happened when Coleen allegedly caught Jamie Vardy's wife Rebekah red handed selling stories about her to the press.

As the nation is gripped by what's been dubbed the Wagatha Christie drama, lots of people have been tweeting Wayne to ask him why he's not said anything yet.

(Image: AFP/Getty Images)

(Image: PA)

One posted, replying to his post about World Mental Health Day: "What a time to be promoting stuff when everyone is waiting to see what you have to say about Coleen. Absolute genius."

"Surely you got something to say about Wagatha Christie, Wazza!?" another tweeted.

A third said: "Never mind that wazza, tell us what you’re thinking re the Mrs and Mrs V?"

(Image: Twitter)

Coleen broke the internet when she said someone using Rebekah's account had sold stories on her.

The stories contained fake things that had happened to Coleen, including choosing her next baby's gender, a flooding in her house and a return to TV, which all got leaked to the press.

She knew then exactly where they had come from, and took to Twitter to accuse her of selling stories.

(Image: Daily Mirror)

Coleen tweeted: "It’s been tough keeping it to myself and not making any comment at all, especially when the stories have been leaked, however I had to.



"Now I know for certain which account / individual it’s come from. I have saved and screenshotted all the original stories which clearly show just one person has viewed them.

"It’s......... Rebekah Vardy’s account."
description: Wayne, 33, has continued to tweet but is yet to make a single comment about the fall out from his wife's now iconic tweet
